name: Rubbermaid 2-Step Steel Step Stool Ladder with Hand Grip, ANSI Type 2 Duty Rating, 225 lb Capacity, White
short_description: STURDY & LIGHTWEIGHT - Weighs just 10.5 pounds with a one-piece welded frame for improved rigidity and stability. Ready to go out of the box - no assembly required. RIGOROUS TESTING - With a 225 lb. capacity, the Rubbermaid step stool is rigorously tested to US Safety Standards and is compliant with OSHA workplace safety requirements, and has an ANSI Type 2 Duty Rating. PORTABLE CONVENIENCE AND STORAGE - this step ladder folds to a 2.4" depth and 37.8" height, providing easy storage and simple portability. RUBBER FEET PADS - Non marring rubber feet pads provide stability without damaging or scratching wood floors 1 YEAR WARRANTY: Innovation is at the heart of Rubbermaid designs - with a 1-year warranty, our heavy-duty step stools help simplify your everyday life
product_description: The Rubbermaid 2 Step Steel Indoor Step Stool is the perfect tool for when you need a little extra height to reach items in the kitchen, bathroom, office or garage. Designed with a durable round tube steel frame and spacious steel platform steps with tread inserts to provide improved traction. Set up is easy - simply fold out and the top step automatically locks into place. At only 10.5-pounds, the lightweight design and soft comfort grip make it easy to move this stepstool wherever you need it. For added stability, this model comes with large non-slip, non-marring feet to keep it in place and will make you feel safe and comfortable getting to those hard to reach places. This 2 step ladder has a weight capacity of 225-pounds and a type 2 ANSI duty rating. The slim profile make it easy to store this step stool for adults where you need it most. The collapsed dimensions are 17.2 (W) by 2.4 (D) by 37.8 (H). Rubbermaid products aim to simplify everyday life with consumer and commercial products that touch millions of people every day where they work, live and play. This folding step stool comes with a 1-year limited warranty
